title: TipoGrafica
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm pretty new to Typophile—I've been lurking around for a few months now, but would just like to say hello! I'm glad I was introduced to such a wealth of knowledge. I'm a graphic design student, and definitely have a nice big place in my heart for typography. Just can't get enough. You know how it goes...

Anyway, I was wondering if anyone could help me out. I just got back from a semester in Spain, and a (design) friend I met over there told me about TipoGrafica, the Buenos Aires–based magazine. Can't believe I hadn't heard of it sooner! Anyway, so I've been reading it online for quite some time now, but can't figure out how to subscribe. Anyone know how to do so? A secret hidden link somewhere?

Thanks in advance!

Cassie
author: Cassie

comments.content:
TipoGráfica magazine stopped publishing early this year:  
 [http://www.irenefernandez.com.ar/badd/2007/01/17/cierra-tipografica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414231212/http:/www.irenefernandez.com.ar/badd/2007/01/17/cierra-tipografica/ "http://www.irenefernandez.com.ar/badd/2007/01/17/cierra-tipografica/")

-- [omine.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414231212/http:/www.omine.net/)

¡No me digas! Ah, what a shame. Well, I'll have to keep reading old copies online, and see if I can't find some printed back-issues or something. I've heard it's beautifully done.

Thanks anyway, though.
